document_data.name: Eldrinn Elpragh
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldrinn Elpragh''' was a boy [[drow]] wizard from [[Sshamath]].
document_data.History:
Eldrinn was a member in the [[College of Divination]] of his city and the son of [[Seldszar Elpragh]].

In {{YearlinkName|1376}}, Eldrinn went to the [[High Moor]] in search of artifacts, with a soldier as escort. 

There he found a [[kiira (disambiguation)|''kiira'']], but they were attacked by monsters. The soldier died and Eldrinn was near death when [[Q'arlynd Melarn]] arrived, who wanted admittance in Sshamath.

In {{YearlinkName|1377}}, Eldrinn was one of the apprentice of Q'arlyn that was about to start his new [[College of Ancient Arcana]].

In {{YearlinkName|1379}}, together with his fellow, his father and the Masters [[Urlryn Khalazza]] and [[Masoj Dhuunyl]] he helped Q'Arlynd when he engineered (with the aid of Eilistraee) the ritual that transformed all drow not tainted by [[Wendonai]]'s blood into brown-skinned [[dark elves]]. After they all relocated to [[Rhymanthiin]].
